headline: How Shifting Price Targets Are Reframing The Story For CenterPoint Energy (CNP)
summary: CenterPoint Energy is back in the spotlight as analysts reset their price targets, reflecting a fresh read on the story behind the stock. This latest revision is rooted in updated expectations and new commentary around how the company is_file viewed in the current market context.
